name: Ionix userbot
description: Userbot created by a  @xclone contact @ionix_ot for support

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable heroku.

ALIVE_PIC.description: put here any telegraph links for alive pic.

PMPERMIT_PIC.description: put here any telegraph links for pmpermit custom pic.

APP_ID.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Please do not steal

API_HASH.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Please do not steal

STRING_SESSION.description: Get this value by running python3 telesetup.py locally

TG_BOT_USER_NAME_BF_HER.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at http://telegram.dog/BotFather and get the username of your bot

TG_BOT_TOKEN_BF_HER.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at http://telegram.dog/BotFather and get the token of your bot.Worth it. Get it.

MAX_FLOOD_IN_P_M_s.description: Maximum number of messages a person can send in pm before getting blocked. Value must be an integer. 6 by default.

OCR_SPACE_API_KEY.description: Required for OCR functionality. Get from https://ocr.space/ocrapi

REM_BG_API_KEY.description: Required for Removing image background functionality. Get from https://www.remove.bg/

GITHUB_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Your Github Access Token for gitcommit plugin.Google 'Github access token' to find.

GIT_REPO_NAME.description: Your repo name Example: WolfGangIndia/WolfUserBot, but GITHUB_ACCESS_TOKEN must be setup first.

G_BAN_LOGGER_GROUP.description: Gban log channel, include the hyphen too: ex: -123456

LYDIA_API_KEY.description: Needed for Lydia AI. Follow https://telegra.ph/Lydia-09-05 to get your API.

UB_BLACK_LIST_CHAT.description: set blacklist_chats where you do not want userbot features

CHROME_BIN.description: Google Chrome (or) Chromium binary location for selenium based modules.

CHROME_DRIVER.description: ChromeDriver location for selenium based modules

DOWNLOAD_PFP_URL_CLOCK.description: Needed for autopic module. A url that is a preview link of your Profile Pic

TZ.description: Required for Correct Time on autopic/get time. Know your timezone from http://www.timezoneconverter.com/cgi-bin/findzone.tzc
